features: 【Small But Mighty】 This micro travel waterproof speaker packs a far more powerful punch than its small size would suggest. It adopts a 5W full-range speaker and a hidden passive radiator on the bottom to deliver surprisingly rich audio and clear sound. Wireless computer speaker without cable hassle for pc laptop, tablet, and smartphone. One of the best gift ideas.

【True Wireless Stereo, Immerse High-Fidelity Sound】This little portable speaker supports wireless stereo pairing to get two C17-max pocket Bluetooth speakers playing together to produce stunning surround sound. This mini Bluetooth speaker will blow you away with its sound, and its size. Let’s get the pocket party high!

【Compact Metal Body For Easy Portability】Light and smooth round metal body with a braided lanyard for easy portability wherever you go. 100g in weight, 50 x 50 mm in size like a golf ball speaker. This travel speaker is perfect for a handbag/backpack and pocket. Also, shockproof anti-falling is a good choice for kids listening.

【Waterproof Shockproof Outdoor Design】You can bring this waterproof shower speaker anywhere, enjoy booming bass in a such small compact package. Bring your outdoor wireless speakers to pool side,patio, offroad, camping, running, bash on the beach even outdoor yoga, all covered.

【Non-Stop Rocking&Bluetooth 5.3 Streaming Connection Without Distrotion】Up to 10 hours of playback on a single charge at 50% volume. Built-in Microphone for hands-free calling function for answering an incoming call without hassle. Play the tiny waterproof Bluetooth speaker up to 100 unobstructed feet away from your device. Connects easily with your Phone, laptop, computer, or tablet to play audiobooks, videos, and music anywhere.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Wirelessly connect two C17MAX speakers for true LEFT/RIGHT stereo imaging. How to set into Stereo Pairing mode? Step 1: Turn on both speakers first, don't connect them with any phone devices before. Step 2: Quick triple-tap the power button on either speaker, then the prompt sound comes out. That means two speakers "PAIRED". Step 3: Please turn on the Bluetooth on your device, and find the model name C17MAX to pair.

Power Supply Range Bring impressive hi-fi sound wherever the road leads with insmy small loudspeaker. We designed a metal mighty mini speaker that keeps pace with all of your adventures, delivers clarity and powerful sound beyond its size. Materials Matter Durable Metal We chose the metal material for this INSMY micro mini Bluetooth speaker’s exterior. It’s a portable performance for all the places and for all outdoor activities you want to join. When an accident happens, no worries about the hurt of this round Bluetooth speaker because it holds up to dents, scratches, and cracks. The expressive details make it look as great as it sounds. Universal Compatibility&Built-in Speakerphone for Hand-free Calls We upgrade this small wireless speaker to Bluetooth 5.3 version. Music flows wirelessly from your smartphone, tablet, laptop, or PC computer. With its built-in microphone, this office speaker also works as a speakerphone. When a call comes in, the music is put on pause and you can talk via the speaker.

IP65 Waterproof Dustproof Rugged We upgraded it into an IP65 rating waterproof dustproof speaker. Now, you can take this small on-the-go speaker on your roads, and strap it on your belt, pocket, or bike. Great for sports activity use. Small But Mighty Portable Design Size: ø50 x 51 mm, Weight: 100g/3.5oz Wherever you’re headed, strap this travel speaker to your bike, backpack, belt, or your golf car. The mini ball size for your pocket or car's cup holder. Lightweight size is a choice for kids' Bluetooth speakers. We upgraded this charging port from the bottom to the side for more convenience. What's in the Box INSMY Mini SpeakerType C Charging CableLanyardInstruction

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A little tinny but the only ones that worked perfectly, with no hassle.
reviews.reviewText: I've tried several of these bluetooth wireless speakers, and all the others were difficult or impossible to set up as a stereo pair. These, however, took just a minute or two to connect to my notebook and give perfect stereo separation. They are smaller than most: about the size of an XL egg, have a lanyard (i'm not using), charge using USB-C, and I have used them for several hours for several days before recharging.The only negative is based on physics. The sound is a bit tinny especially the bass, and there is no compensating equalization switch. But, they still sound better than the internal speakers in my Surface Go and are so small they are great for when we travel.Size? Super small and portable!Ease of set up and use? As good as it gets.Charge? Lasts and lasts and lasts.Price? Incredibly reasonable. They are looking to unload the red ones so they are priced lower AND have a coupon not available on the other colors.Sound? Leaves a little to be desired.Update: Still love them, and they are still offering the special pricing on the red ones. One night, watching the new "DUNE" movie, my wife complained they were too loud! :)But if they aren't set at high volume, they actually are hard to hear unless you're near them. So I can listen happily with stereo separation and the sound doesn't carry beyond me the way the Surface's speaker does. They are GREAT for travelling, too!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Tiny but they pack a punch, I highly recommend buying a set for the stereo feature!
reviews.reviewText: My old JAM Plus bluetooth speaker died and I needed a replacement. I'm glad I read the reviews because they didn't steer me wrong (in fact, they encouraged me to purchase two, so I did)! They were super easy to pair with my devices and they were really easy to pair with one another so they function as stereo speakers. The sound quality is awesome for something so diminutive, and you can literally tuck them anywhere. You can't beat the price point, and even buying two so that you have a pair, they're still less than other Bluetooth speakers and the sound quality is comparable (and perhaps a bit better).My only criticism is the the charging port is on the bottom, and it doesn't seem that you can use them and charge them simultaneously, which is kind of a bummer for anyone like me who has a fixed place to use them indoors. I loved that I could use my previous speaker while it was charging so I never had to go without music or podcasts in my work area.I get a few hours out of each charge. The design (with the exception of the location of the charging port) is lovely. They're attractive, unobtrusive, and have a small footprint. They're especially portable given their size - you can put one in a coat pocket and barely know it's there.I highly recommend this little gem, it's one of my favorite Amazon purchases!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works awesome and lasts
reviews.reviewText: I can't believe how great the sound quality and volume is for such a small speaker. I've had this a year now - still works great, holds a charge, etc. I don't use it daily but regularly. Love it for travel because it's so small.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Look! It's a GOOD mini-speaker!
reviews.reviewText: The laws of physics reveal the limits of mini-speakers. But any mini-speaker is way better than any laptop sound of machines I've owned.OK, OK, I buy inexpensive laptops because I've learned that at their heart, laptops are disposies. One bus trip to many, or flight, or even cab rides and the laptop has died, has been stolen, or has been left unintentionally either by your own stupidity or that of others. So: my phone is an iPhone, but an older model I bought used with a LOT of memory since I can't add any to it myself. My reader is a kindle fire tablet, and eight-inch model because I needed one with a lot of room for books. and my laptop cost me four hundred bucks. The speakers, like those on my last 5 laptops, are pretty bad. But I could fix that for $20.00, and get stereo by buying ANOTHER of them, an identical one bought three days after I bought one. Yes, they're pretty good. No, Celtic Women sound lousy on one of them, and less than wonderful even on two. The limits of physics. But, two of these are MUCH better than any single $40-$80 mini-speaker I've seen (You'd have to try them side by side with a larger speaker to judge them yourself. But they're WAY better than the last pair of speakers hooked to my desktop (I've moved up to a genuine sound bar for my desktop, A CR stealthbar, and that IS better than the mini-speakers. They are quite good, actually. Quite durable (I haven't tried them in a tub of water, mind you). Excellent batter life, and require you PLUG THEM IN AND CHARGE THEM WHEN THEY ARRIVE. Charging on a 5w USB port didn't take very long, but I didn't time it. And they'll convince you they are MUCH bigger than they really are when you hear them. Buy one, and buy another once you've got one. They're WONDERFUL for voice, way LOUDER than any cheap laptop's own speakers that I've ever forced myself to listen to, and not bad for music. -tc

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Convenient and works well.
reviews.reviewText: I was getting a gift as part of a grab bag for a group I belong to and I decided to order one for myself.It was easier than I expected to use.It's basically just a matter of connecting by Bluetooth and here I have this item with better than expected sound keeping me entertained while I am teleworking.Pretty red color and definitely worth the money.

reviews.reviewerName: I’m giving this 2 stars, one for lightweight and one for small and chick design. I bought it as an extra for guest etc. it is barely hot and takes forever to dry. Don’t recommend. I’m shocked at all the good reviews.
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is a cute little speaker. Great volume considering it’s so tiny. Great for my office. Great value.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Darling little thing
reviews.reviewText: Just as advertised but better. Pairing is super fast. Long charge duration. Super fast recharge. Great sound for what I needed... Super cute as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazingly small,but really big sound.
reviews.reviewText: I bought this as a stocking stuffer for my mom and I have to say I did not think the sound was going to be loud as a regular sized speaker,but it was and it is a very convent to have you can easily travel with it.
Excelente producto, buena calidad, tamaño mini y sonido fuerte y claro, 100% recomendable
